text: Francesca Bettrone (born 5 August 1991) is an Italian speed skater who competed in the 2015–16 ISU Speed Skating World Cup, the 2016–17 ISU Speed Skating World Cup and the 2017 European Speed Skating Championships. ==Personal records== ==References== ==External links== * Eurosport profile * Category:1991 births Category:Italian female speed skaters Category:Living people Category:Speed skaters at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:Olympic speed skaters of Italy Category:Competitors at the 2009 World Games
title: Francesca Bettrone
